column4: i just installed Ubuntu (hardy 8.04). I have a ASUS P5K motherboard but somehow i have NO SOUND. can someone help me with this? :( I am desperate!!
i need help here
thank you Grim76_ ... i just wanted to know if ppl were ignoring me
have you messed with alsamixer
just run alsamixer in terminal and see if all your levels are up
, whats the command i put into the terminal (linux noob here)
alsamixer
--> Master, PCM and Front seem to be fine... FrontMi, Surround, Center are @ 0
did you turn them up and give it a whirl?
--> still nothing
what kind of soundcard is it
--> its included in the motherboard ... which is an ASUS P5K motherboard
try going to system>preferences>sound, what does it say you're using for playback?
--> Sound Playback: Autodetect
try changing them to ALSA....
--> OH!!! I GOT SOUND but its very weak!!
try adjusting the volume or going into alsamixer
--> the volume is adjusted (100%) and alsamixer is @ 100 too
is it crackly or just weak
--> just weak
Sorry but I have to go. My boss actually has some work for me today. I hope you can figure out your problem...
no problem. :)
